example.text: Introduced Bill to Stop Hochul from Undermining Medicaid Programs Governor Hochul is moving forward with a budget that steals federal Medicaid dollars from programs that vulnerable New Yorkers rely on . I introduced a measure to stop the Governor from putting these programs on the chopping block.

We discussed ways the federal government can collaborate with the City to make Hudson an even better place to live and work! Sat down with Town of Ulster Supervisor Jim Quigley to discuss our work to bring opportunities to Ulster and make our community better.

I'm fighting back and pushing for enactment of a federal bill that prevents Albany's overtime rule from taking effect. Federal Investments for New York $8 million is being sent to Opportunities for Otsego and Tompkins Community Action for Head Start early education programming.

Holding Fraudsters Accountable New York State had one of the highest rates of fraud through US Small Business Administration's COVID-19 relief programs. It is INSULTING to American taxpayers that the Administrator of the SBA would not appear before our latest House Small Business Committee hearing to testify on this.

TAKE MY OFFICAL SURVEY Governor Hochul and the Biden Administration have both proposed regulations that amount to a ban on gas stoves. I am opposed to these dangerous and costly proposals - but I want to hear from you!

I introduced legislation to hold foreign aircraft maintenance facilities to the same standards that we have here in the United States. This bill will uphold the highest level of aircraft safety and remove the incentive to offshore jobs.

I'm fighting back and pushing for enactment of a federal bill that prevents Albany's overtime rule from taking effect. Federal Investments for New York $8 million is being sent to Opportunities for Otsego and Tompkins Community Action for Head Start early education programming.
